00020 namespace eval themer {
00021 
00022   variable theme_dir      [file join $::tke_dir data themes]
00023   variable tmtheme        ""
00024   variable write_callback ""
00025 
00026   array set widgets     {}
00027   array set all_scopes  {}
00028   array set orig_labels {}
00029   array set show_vars   {}
00030   array set labels      {}
00031 
00032   array set label_index {
00033     color      0
00034     tagpos     1
00035     scope      2
00036     show       3
00037     changed    4
00038   }
00039 
00040   array set scope_map {
00041     comment              comments
00042     keyword              keywords
00043     string               strings
00044     entity               punctuation
00045     entity.name.tag      punctuation
00046     punctuation          punctuation
00047     meta.preprocessor.c  precompile
00048     other.preprocessor.c precompile
00049     constant             numbers
00050     constant.numeric     numbers
00051     meta.tag             miscellaneous1
00052     support              miscellaneous1
00053     support.function     miscellaneous1
00054     support.type         miscellaneous1
00055     variable             miscellaneous2
00056     variable.other       miscellaneous2
00057     variable.parameter   miscellaneous2
00058     storage              miscellaneous3
00059     constant.other       miscellaneous3
00060   }
00061 
00062   array set base_labels {
00063     background        {""       ""            "" 1 0}
00064     foreground        {""       ""            "" 1 0}
00065     line_number       {""       ""            "" 1 0}
00066     warning_width     {""       ""            "" 1 0}
00067     difference_sub    {""       ""            "" 0 0}
00068     difference_add    {""       ""            "" 0 0}
00069     select_background {"blue"   ""            "" 0 0}
00070     select_foreground {"white"  ""            "" 0 0}
00071     border_highlight  {"yellow" ""            "" 1 0}
00072     cursor            {""       "-background" "" 1 0}
00073     keywords          {""       "-foreground" "" 1 0}
00074     comments          {""       "-foreground" "" 1 0}
00075     strings           {""       "-foreground" "" 1 0}
00076     numbers           {""       "-foreground" "" 1 0}
00077     punctuation       {""       "-foreground" "" 1 0}
00078     precompile        {""       "-foreground" "" 1 0}
00079     miscellaneous1    {""       "-foreground" "" 1 0}
00080     miscellaneous2    {""       "-foreground" "" 1 0}
00081     miscellaneous3    {""       "-foreground" "" 1 0}
00082   }
00083 
00084   # Add trace to the labels array
00085   trace variable themer::labels    w themer::handle_label_change
00086   trace variable themer::show_vars w themer::handle_show_vars_change

00088   #############################################################
00089   # Called whenever a menu item is selected in the scope menu.
00090   proc handle_label_change {name1 lbl op} {
00091 
00092     variable labels
00093     variable label_index
00094     variable widgets
00095     
00096     # Don't continue if the UI isn't built yet
00097     if {![info exists widgets(txt)]} {
00098       return
00099     }
00100 
00101     # Get the color from the label
00102     set color [lindex $labels($lbl) $label_index(color)]
00103 
00104     # Set the button and label
00105     $widgets(b:$lbl) configure -text [lindex $labels($lbl) $label_index(scope)]
00106 
00107     # Set the image
00108     if {$lbl eq "background"} {
00109       foreach {l info} [array get labels] {
00110         if {[set lcolor [lindex $info $label_index(color)]] ne ""} {
00111           set_button_image $l $lcolor
00112         }
00113       }
00114       foreach tlbl [list warning_width line_number] {
00115         if {[lindex $labels($tlbl) $label_index(changed)] == 0} {
00116           lset labels($tlbl) $label_index(color) [utils::auto_adjust_color $color 40]
00117         }
00118       }
00119       if {[lindex $labels(difference_sub) $label_index(changed)] == 0} {
00120         lset labels(difference_sub) $label_index(color) [utils::auto_mix_colors $color r 30]
00121       }
00122       if {[lindex $labels(difference_add) $label_index(changed)] == 0} {
00123         lset labels(difference_add) $label_index(color) [utils::auto_mix_colors $color g 30]
00124       }
00125     } else {
00126       set_button_image $lbl $color
00127     }
00128 
00129     # Highlight the sample textbox
00130     highlight
00131 
00132   }
00133 
00134   ######################################################################
00135   # Handles any changes to the show_vars variable.
00136   proc handle_show_vars_change {name1 lbl op} {
00137 
00138     # Highlight the sample textbox
00139     highlight
00140 
00141   }

00143   ######################################################################
00144   # Generates a valid RGB color.
00145   proc normalize_color {color} {
00146 
00147     if {[string index $color 0] eq "#"} {
00148       return [string range $color 0 6]
00149     } else {
00150       return $color
00151     }
00152 
00153   }
00154 
00155   ######################################################################
00156   # Sets the image for the type button.
00157   proc set_button_image {lbl color} {
00158 
00159     variable widgets
00160     variable labels
00161     variable label_index
00162 
00163     # Delete the current image
00164     if {[set img [$widgets(b:$lbl) cget -image]] ne ""} {
00165       image delete $img
00166     }
00167 
00168     # Create the image
00169     set img [image create bitmap -file [file join $::tke_dir lib images color.bmp] \
00170                                  -background [lindex $labels(background) $label_index(color)] -foreground $color]
00171 
00172     # Set the image
00173     $widgets(b:$lbl) configure -image $img
00174 
00175   }
00176 
00177   ######################################################################
00178   # Reads the given TextMate theme file and extracts the relevant information
00179   # for tke's needs.
00180   proc read_tmtheme {theme} {
00181 
00182     variable labels
00183     variable scope_map
00184     variable all_scopes
00185     variable tmtheme
00186     variable orig_labels
00187     variable widgets
00188     variable label_index
00189 
00190     set tmtheme $theme
00191 
00192     if {![catch { open $theme r } rc]} {
00193 
00194       # Read the contents of the file into 'content' and close the file
00195       set content [string map {\n { }} [read $rc]]
00196       close $rc
00197 
00198       array set depth {
00199         plist  0
00200         array  0
00201         dict   0
00202         key    0
00203         string 0
00204       }
00205 
00206       set scope       0
00207       set foreground  0
00208       set background  0
00209       set caret       0
00210       set scope_types ""
00211 
00212       while {[regexp {\s*([^<]*)\s*<(/?\w+)[^>]*>(.*)$} $content -> value element content]} {
00213         if {[string index $element 0] eq "/"} {
00214           set element [string range $element 1 end]
00215           switch $element {
00216             key {
00217               switch $value {
00218                 scope      { set scope      1 }
00219                 foreground { set foreground 1 }
00220                 background { set background 1 }
00221                 caret      { set caret      1 }
00222               }
00223             }
00224             string {
00225               if {$scope} {
00226                 set scope       0
00227                 set scope_types $value
00228               } elseif {$foreground} {
00229                 set foreground 0
00230                 set color      [normalize_color $value]
00231                 if {$scope_types eq ""} {
00232                   lset labels(foreground) $label_index(color) $color
00233                   lset labels(foreground) $label_index(scope) "foreground"
00234                   set all_scopes(foreground) $color
00235                 } else {
00236                   foreach scope_type [string map {, { }} $scope_types] {
00237                     if {[info exists scope_map($scope_type)]} {
00238                       set lbl $scope_map($scope_type)
00239                       lset labels($lbl) $label_index(color) $color
00240                       lset labels($lbl) $label_index(scope) $scope_type
00241                     }
00242                     set all_scopes($scope_type) $color
00243                   }
00244                 }
00245               } elseif {$background} {
00246                 set background 0
00247                 set color      [normalize_color $value]
00248                 if {$scope_types eq ""} {
00249                   lset labels(background)    $label_index(color) $color
00250                   lset labels(background)    $label_index(scope) "background"
00251                   lset labels(warning_width) $label_index(color) [utils::auto_adjust_color $color 40]
00252                   set all_scopes(background) $color
00253                 }
00254               } elseif {$caret} {
00255                 set caret 0
00256                 set color [normalize_color $value]
00257                 if {$scope_types eq ""} {
00258                   lset labels(cursor) $label_index(color) $color
00259                   lset labels(cursor) $label_index(scope) "cursor"
00260                   set all_scopes(cursor) $color
00261                 }
00262               }
00263             }
00264           }
00265           incr depth($element) -1
00266         } else {
00267           incr depth($element)
00268         }
00269       }
00270 
00271     } elseif {[file tail $::argv0] eq "themer.tcl"} {
00272 
00273       puts [msgcat::mc "ERROR:  Unable to read %s" $theme]
00274       puts $rc
00275       exit 1
00276 
00277     }
00278 
00279     # Save the labels array to orig_labels
00280     array set orig_labels [array get labels]
00281 
00282   }
00283 
00284   ######################################################################
00285   # Reads the contents of the tketheme and stores the results
00286   proc read_tketheme {theme} {
00287 
00288     variable labels
00289     variable label_index
00290     variable orig_labels
00291 
00292     if {![catch { open $theme r } rc]} {
00293 
00294       # Read the contents from the file and close
00295       array set contents [read $rc]
00296       close $rc
00297 
00298       # Store the contents into the labels array
00299       foreach {lbl info} [array get labels] {
00300         if {[info exists contents($lbl)]} {
00301           lset labels($lbl) $label_index(color) $contents($lbl)
00302         }
00303       }
00304 
00305       # Save the labels array to orig_labels
00306       array set orig_labels [array get labels]
00307 
00308     } elseif {[file tail $::argv0] eq "themer.tcl"} {
00309 
00310       puts [msgcat::mc "ERROR:  Unable to read %s" $theme]
00311       puts $rc
00312       exit 1
00313 
00314     }
00315 
00316   }
00317 
00318   ######################################################################
00319   # Displays a window showing all of the current themes.
00320   proc get_theme {} {
00321 
00322     # Initialize variables
00323     set w            ".thrwin"
00324     set ::theme_name ""
00325 
00326     # Create the window
00327     toplevel     $w
00328     wm title     $w [msgcat::mc "Select theme"]
00329     wm transient $w .
00330     wm resizable $w 0 0
00331 
00332     ttk::frame     $w.tf
00333     listbox        $w.tf.lb -height 8 -selectmode "single" -yscrollcommand "$w.tf.vb set"
00334     ttk::scrollbar $w.tf.vb -orient vertical -command "$w.tf.lb yview"
00335 
00336     grid rowconfigure    $w.tf 0 -weight 1
00337     grid columnconfigure $w.tf 0 -weight 1
00338     grid $w.tf.lb -row 0 -column 0 -sticky news
00339     grid $w.tf.vb -row 0 -column 1 -sticky ns
00340 
00341     # Figure out the width of the buttons
00342     set bwidth [msgcat::mcmax "OK" "Cancel"]
00343 
00344     ttk::frame  $w.bf
00345     ttk::button $w.bf.ok -text [msgcat::mc "OK"] -width $bwidth -command {
00346       set ::theme_name [.thrwin.tf.lb get [.thrwin.tf.lb curselection]]
00347       destroy .thrwin
00348     }
00349     ttk::button $w.bf.cancel -text [msgcat::mc "Cancel"] -width $bwidth -command {
00350       destroy .thrwin
00351     }
00352 
00353     pack $w.bf.cancel -side right -padx 2 -pady 2
00354     pack $w.bf.ok     -side right -padx 2 -pady 2
00355 
00356     pack $w.tf -fill x
00357     pack $w.bf -fill x
00358 
00359     bind $w.tf.lb <Return> {
00360       set ::theme_name [.thrwin.tf.lb get [.thrwin.tf.lb curselection]]
00361       destroy .thrwin
00362     }
00363     bind $w.tf.lb <Double-Button-1> {
00364       set ::theme_name [.thrwin.tf.lb get [.thrwin.tf.lb curselection]]
00365       destroy .thrwin
00366     }
00367 
00368     # Get the theme names
00369     foreach theme [lsort [glob -tails -directory [file join $::tke_dir data themes] *.tketheme]] {
00370       $w.tf.lb insert end [file rootname $theme]
00371     }
00372     $w.tf.lb selection set 0
00373 
00374     # Center the window and grab the focus
00375     ::tk::PlaceWindow $w widget .
00376     ::tk::SetFocusGrab $w $w
00377 
00378     # Put the focus on the listbox
00379     focus $w.tf.lb
00380 
00381     # Wait for the window to be closed
00382     tkwait window $w
00383 
00384     # Release the grab/focus
00385     ::tk::RestoreFocusGrab $w $w
00386 
00387     if {$::theme_name ne ""} {
00388       return [file join $::tke_dir data themes ${::theme_name}.tketheme]
00389     } else {
00390       return ""
00391     }
00392 
00393   }

00395   ######################################################################
00396   # Displays a window that gets the name of a theme file.
00397   proc get_save_name {} {
00398 
00399     # Initialize variables
00400     set w            "[get_path].swin"
00401     set ::theme_name ""
00402 
00403     # Create the window
00404     toplevel     $w
00405     wm title     $w [msgcat::mc "Enter theme name"]
00406     wm transient $w [get_win]
00407     wm resizable $w 0 0
00408 
00409     ttk::frame $w.tf
00410     ttk::label $w.tf.l -text [msgcat::mc "Name:"]
00411     ttk::entry $w.tf.e -validate key -invalidcommand bell -validatecommand {
00412       [themer::get_path].swin.bf.ok configure \
00413         -state [expr {([string length %P] eq "") ? "disabled" : "normal"}]
00414       return 1
00415     }
00416 
00417     pack $w.tf.l -side left -padx 2 -pady 2
00418     pack $w.tf.e -side left -fill x -padx 2 -pady 2
00419 
00420     set bwidth [msgcat::mcmax "OK" "Cancel"]
00421 
00422     ttk::frame  $w.bf
00423     ttk::button $w.bf.ok -text [msgcat::mc "OK"] -width $bwidth -state disabled -command {
00424       set top          [themer::get_path]
00425       set ::theme_name [$top.swin.tf.e get]
00426       destroy $top.swin
00427     }
00428     ttk::button $w.bf.cancel -text [msgcat::mc "Cancel"] -width $bwidth -command {
00429       destroy [themer::get_path].swin
00430     }
00431 
00432     pack $w.bf.cancel -side right -padx 2 -pady 2
00433     pack $w.bf.ok     -side right -padx 2 -pady 2
00434 
00435     pack $w.tf -fill x
00436     pack $w.bf -fill x
00437 
00438     bind $w.tf.e <Return> {
00439       set top [themer::get_path]
00440       if {[set ::theme_name [$top.swin.tf.e get]] ne ""} {
00441         destroy $top.swin
00442       }
00443     }
00444 
00445     # Center the window and grab the focus
00446     ::tk::PlaceWindow $w widget [get_win]
00447     ::tk::SetFocusGrab $w $w
00448 
00449     # Focus on the entry
00450     focus $w.tf.e
00451 
00452     # Wait for the window to be closed
00453     tkwait window $w
00454 
00455     # Release the grab/focus
00456     ::tk::RestoreFocusGrab $w $w
00457 
00458     if {$::theme_name ne ""} {
00459       return "[file tail [file rootname $::theme_name]].tketheme"
00460     } else {
00461       return ""
00462     }
00463 
00464   }
00465 
00466   ######################################################################
00467   # Writes the TKE theme file to the theme directory.
00468   proc write_tketheme {} {
00469 
00470     variable theme_dir
00471     variable tmtheme
00472     variable labels
00473     variable label_index
00474     variable write_callback
00475 
00476     # If we don't have a theme name, get one
00477     if {$tmtheme eq ""} {
00478       if {[set tmtheme [get_save_name]] eq ""} {
00479         return 0
00480       }
00481     }
00482 
00483     # Get the basename of the tmtheme file
00484     set basename [file rootname [file tail $tmtheme]]
00485 
00486     if {![catch { open [file join $theme_dir $basename.tketheme] w } rc]} {
00487 
00488       foreach lbl [lsort [array names labels]] {
00489         puts $rc [format "%-17s \"%s\"" $lbl [string tolower [lindex $labels($lbl) $label_index(color)]]]
00490       }
00491 
00492       close $rc
00493 
00494       # If we have a write callback routine, call it now
00495       if {$write_callback ne ""} {
00496         uplevel #0 $write_callback
00497       }
00498 
00499     } elseif {[file tail $::argv0] eq "themer.tcl"} {
00500 
00501       puts [msgcat::mc "ERROR:  Unable to write %s" [file join $theme_dir $basename.tketheme]]
00502       puts $rc
00503       exit 1
00504 
00505     }
00506 
00507     return 1
00508 
00509   }

00511   ######################################################################
00512   # Creates the UI for the importer, automatically populating it with
00513   # the default values.
00514   proc create {{callback ""}} {
00515 
00516     variable widgets
00517     variable labels
00518     variable label_index
00519     variable all_scopes
00520     variable tmtheme
00521     variable write_callback
00522     variable show_vars
00523 
00524     # Set the write callback proc
00525     set write_callback $callback
00526 
00527     # Make it so that the window cannot be resized
00528     if {[file tail $::argv0] ne "themer.tcl"} {
00529       toplevel [get_win]
00530       wm transient [get_win] .
00531     }
00532     wm resizable [get_win] 0 0
00533 
00534     # Create top frame
00535     ttk::frame [get_path].tf
00536 
00537     # Create top-left frame
00538     ttk::frame [get_path].tf.lf
00539 
00540     # Add background color
00541     create_color_row background 0
00542     create_color_row foreground 1
00543 
00544     # Add separator
00545     ttk::separator [get_path].tf.lf.sep
00546     grid [get_path].tf.lf.sep -row 2 -column 0 -sticky ew -padx 2 -pady 2 -columnspan 2
00547 
00548     set i 3
00549 
00550     foreach lbl [lsort [array names labels]] {
00551 
00552       # Don't do anything with the background and foreground labels since we have already handled them
00553       if {[lsearch [list background foreground] $lbl] != -1} {
00554         continue
00555       }
00556 
00557       # Create the label and menubutton
00558       create_color_row $lbl $i
00559 
00560       incr i
00561 
00562     }
00563 
00564     # Create the top-right frame
00565     ttk::labelframe [get_path].tf.rf -text "Sample Text"
00566     set widgets(border) [frame [get_path].tf.rf.f     -padx 1 -pady 1]
00567     set widgets(gutter) [text  [get_path].tf.rf.f.gut   -relief flat -bd 0 -width 4  -height 10 -highlightthickness 0]
00568     set widgets(vr)     [frame [get_path].tf.rf.f.vr    -relief flat -bd 0 -width 1]
00569     set widgets(txt)    [text  [get_path].tf.rf.f.txt   -relief flat -bd 0 -width 40 -height 10 -highlightthickness 0]
00570     set widgets(warn)   [frame [get_path].tf.rf.f.txt.w -relief flat -bd 0 -width 1]
00571 
00572     # Insert line numbers into gutter
00573     for {set i 167} {$i < 197} {incr i} {
00574       $widgets(gutter) insert end "$i\n"
00575     }
00576 
00577     # Insert sample text
00578     $widgets(txt) insert end "#ifdef DFN\n"
00579     $widgets(txt) insert end "\n"
00580     $widgets(txt) insert end "  // Some sort of comment\n"
00581     $widgets(txt) insert end "  void foobar () {\n"
00582     $widgets(txt) insert end "    int a = 100;\n"
00583     $widgets(txt) insert end "    printf( \"a: %d\\n\", a );\n"
00584     $widgets(txt) insert end "  }\n"
00585     $widgets(txt) insert end "\n"
00586     $widgets(txt) insert end "#endif\n"
00587 
00588     # Tag the text widget
00589     $widgets(txt) tag add precompile     1.0 1.10 9.0 9.6
00590     $widgets(txt) tag add comments       3.2 3.25
00591     $widgets(txt) tag add keywords       4.2 4.6 5.4 5.7 6.4 6.10
00592     $widgets(txt) tag add numbers        5.12 5.15
00593     $widgets(txt) tag add strings        6.12 6.21
00594     $widgets(txt) tag add miscellaneous1 6.4 6.10
00595     $widgets(txt) tag add punctuation    4.14 4.19 5.10 5.11 5.15 5.16 6.10 6.11 6.21 6.22 6.25 6.27 7.2 7.3
00596     $widgets(txt) tag add cursor         4.2 4.3
00597     $widgets(txt) tag add subonly        1.0 10.0
00598     $widgets(txt) tag add addonly        1.0 10.0
00599     $widgets(txt) tag add sub            5.0 6.0
00600     $widgets(txt) tag add add            6.0 7.0
00601     $widgets(txt) tag add select         3.0 5.0
00602 
00603     # Disable the text widgets
00604     $widgets(gutter) configure -state disabled
00605     $widgets(txt)    configure -state disabled
00606 
00607     grid rowconfigure    [get_path].tf.rf.f 0 -weight 1
00608     grid columnconfigure [get_path].tf.rf.f 2 -weight 1
00609     grid $widgets(gutter) -row 0 -column 0 -sticky ns
00610     grid $widgets(vr)     -row 0 -column 1 -sticky ns
00611     grid $widgets(txt)    -row 0 -column 2 -sticky news
00612 
00613     place $widgets(warn) -x [font measure [$widgets(txt) cget -font] -displayof . [string repeat "m" 30]] -relheight 1.0
00614     
00615     pack [get_path].tf.rf.f -fill both -expand yes
00616 
00617     grid [get_path].tf.lf -row 0 -column 0 -sticky news -padx 2 -pady 2
00618     grid [get_path].tf.rf -row 0 -column 1 -sticky news -padx 2 -pady 2
00619 
00620     set bwidth [msgcat::mcmax "Reset" "Save As" "Import" "Create" "Save" "Cancel"]
00621 
00622     # Create the button frame
00623     ttk::frame  [get_path].bf
00624     set widgets(reset) [ttk::button [get_path].bf.reset  -text [msgcat::mc "Reset"] -width $bwidth -command {
00625       array set themer::labels [array get themer::orig_labels]
00626       themer::highlight
00627     }]
00628     set widgets(saveas) [ttk::button [get_path].bf.saveas -text [msgcat::mc "Save As"] -width $bwidth -command {
00629       set orig_tmtheme    $themer::tmtheme
00630       set themer::tmtheme ""
00631       if {[themer::write_tketheme]} {
00632         themer::destroy_win
00633       } else {
00634         set themer::tmtheme $orig_tmtheme
00635       }
00636     }]
00637     set widgets(action) [ttk::button [get_path].bf.import -text [msgcat::mc "Import"] -width $bwidth -command {
00638       if {[themer::write_tketheme]} {
00639         themer::destroy_win
00640       }
00641     }]
00642     ttk::button [get_path].bf.cancel -text [msgcat::mc "Cancel"] -width $bwidth -command {
00643       themer::destroy_win
00644     }
00645 
00646     if {$tmtheme ne ""} {
00647       pack [get_path].bf.reset  -side left  -padx 2 -pady 2
00648     }
00649 
00650     pack [get_path].bf.cancel -side right -padx 2 -pady 2
00651     pack [get_path].bf.import -side right -padx 2 -pady 2
00652 
00653     pack [get_path].tf -fill both -expand yes
00654     pack [get_path].bf -fill x
00655 
00656     # If the window is coming from tke, center it in the window
00657     if {[file tail $::argv0] ne "themer.tcl"} {
00658       ::tk::PlaceWindow [get_win] widget .
00659     }
00660 
00661   }
00662   
00663   ######################################################################
00664   # Called to destroy the window
00665   proc destroy_win {} {
00666     
00667     variable widgets
00668     
00669     # Clear the widgets namespace
00670     array unset widgets
00671     
00672     # Destroy the window
00673     destroy [get_win]
00674     
00675   }
00676 
00677   ######################################################################
00678   # Creates a row in the color selection sidebar.
00679   proc create_color_row {lbl row} {
00680 
00681     variable widgets
00682     variable show_vars
00683     variable labels
00684     variable label_index
00685 
00686     if {($lbl eq "background") || ($lbl eq "foreground") || ($lbl eq "select_foreground")} {
00687       set widgets(l:$lbl) [ttk::label [get_path].tf.lf.l$lbl -text "     [convert_label $lbl]:"]
00688     } else {
00689       set widgets(l:$lbl) [ttk::checkbutton [get_path].tf.lf.l$lbl -text " [convert_label $lbl]:" -variable themer::show_vars($lbl)]
00690       set show_vars($lbl) [lindex $labels($lbl) $label_index(show)]
00691     }
00692 
00693     set widgets(b:$lbl) [ttk::label [get_path].tf.lf.b$lbl -anchor w -relief raised]
00694 
00695     bind $widgets(b:$lbl) <Button-1> "themer::show_menu $lbl"
00696     
00697     # Create menu
00698     set widgets(m:$lbl) [menu [get_path].tf.lf.b$lbl.mnu -tearoff 0]
00699 
00700     # Add custom command so that we don't get an error when parsing
00701     $widgets(m:$lbl) add command -label [msgcat::mc "Create custom"] -command "themer::create_custom_color $lbl"
00702  
00703     # Add them to the grid
00704     grid $widgets(l:$lbl) -row $row -column 0 -sticky news -padx 2 -pady 2
00705     grid $widgets(b:$lbl) -row $row -column 1 -sticky news -padx 2 -pady 2
00706 
00707   }
00708 
00709   ######################################################################
00710   # Replaces underscores with spaces and converts everything to title case.
00711   proc convert_label {name} {
00712 
00713     set str ""
00714     foreach part [split $name _] {
00715       append str "[string totitle $part] "
00716     }
00717 
00718     return [string trimright $str]
00719 
00720   }
00721 
00722   ######################################################################
00723   # Displays the menu for the given color type.
00724   proc show_menu {lbl} {
00725  
00726     variable widgets
00727     variable tmtheme
00728  
00729     # If we are dealing with a theme, display the menu
00730     if {$tmtheme ne ""} {
00731  
00732       tk_popup $widgets(m:$lbl) \
00733         [winfo rootx $widgets(b:$lbl)] \
00734         [expr [winfo rooty $widgets(b:$lbl)] + [winfo reqheight $widgets(b:$lbl)]]
00735  
00736     # Otherwise, if we are creating a new, just launch the color chooser
00737     } else {
00738  
00739       create_custom_color $lbl
00740  
00741     }
00742  
00743   }
00744  
00745   #############################################################
00746   # Called whenever a menu item is selected inthe scope menu.
00747   proc handle_menu_select {lbl scope} {
00748 
00749     variable labels
00750     variable label_index
00751     variable all_scopes
00752 
00753     # Set the current color to the given scope
00754     lset labels($lbl) $label_index(color) $all_scopes($scope)
00755     lset labels($lbl) $label_index(scope) $scope
00756 
00757   }
00758 
00759   ######################################################################
00760   # Allows the user to create a custom color.
00761   proc create_custom_color {lbl} {
00762 
00763     variable labels
00764     variable label_index
00765 
00766     # Set the color to the chosen color
00767     if {[set color [tk_chooseColor -initialcolor [lindex $labels($lbl) $label_index(color)] -parent [get_win] -title [convert_label $lbl]]] ne ""} {
00768       lset labels($lbl) $label_index(color)   $color
00769       lset labels($lbl) $label_index(changed) 1
00770     }
00771 
00772   }
00773 
00774   ######################################################################
00775   # Perform the highlight on the text widget based on the current labels.
00776   proc highlight {} {
00777 
00778     variable widgets
00779     variable labels
00780     variable label_index
00781     variable all_scopes
00782     variable tmtheme
00783     variable show_vars
00784 
00785     # Skip if the widgets do not yet exist
00786     if {![info exists widgets(txt)]} {
00787       return
00788     }
00789 
00790     # Create a temporary frame to get its default color
00791     frame .__tmp
00792     set bdcolor [.__tmp cget -background]
00793     destroy .__tmp
00794     
00795     # Get the background color
00796     set bgcolor [lindex $labels(background) $label_index(color)]
00797     
00798     # Colorize the border
00799     if {[set color [lindex $labels(border_highlight) $label_index(color)]] ne ""} {
00800       $widgets(border) configure -background [expr {$show_vars(border_highlight) ? $color : $bdcolor}]
00801     }
00802 
00803     # Colorize the gutter
00804     if {[set color [lindex $labels(line_number) $label_index(color)]] ne ""} {
00805       $widgets(gutter) configure -foreground [expr {$show_vars(line_number) ? $color : $bgcolor}]
00806     }
00807 
00808     # Colorize all of the foreground tags and the menu
00809     foreach {lbl info} [array get labels] {
00810       if {[set pos [lindex $info $label_index(tagpos)]] ne ""} {
00811         $widgets(txt) tag configure $lbl $pos [expr {$show_vars($lbl) ? [lindex $info $label_index(color)] : ""}]
00812       }
00813     }
00814 
00815     # Colorize the text widget itself
00816     if {[set color [lindex $labels(foreground) $label_index(color)]] ne ""} {
00817       $widgets(txt) configure -foreground $color
00818     }
00819     if {[set color [lindex $labels(background) $label_index(color)]] ne ""} {
00820       $widgets(gutter) configure -background $color
00821       $widgets(txt)    configure -background $color
00822     }
00823 
00824     # Colorize the vr and warn frames
00825     if {[set color [lindex $labels(warning_width) $label_index(color)]] ne ""} {
00826       $widgets(vr)   configure -background [expr {$show_vars(warning_width) ? $color : $bgcolor}]
00827       $widgets(warn) configure -background [expr {$show_vars(warning_width) ? $color : $bgcolor}]
00828     }
00829 
00830     # Colorize the difference backgrounds
00831     if {[set color [lindex $labels(difference_sub) $label_index(color)]] ne ""} {
00832       $widgets(txt) tag configure sub     -background ""
00833       $widgets(txt) tag configure subonly -background ""
00834       if {$show_vars(difference_sub)} {
00835         $widgets(txt) tag configure [expr {$show_vars(difference_add) ? "sub" : "subonly"}] -background $color
00836       }
00837     }
00838     if {[set color [lindex $labels(difference_add) $label_index(color)]] ne ""} {
00839       $widgets(txt) tag configure add     -background ""
00840       $widgets(txt) tag configure addonly -background ""
00841       if {$show_vars(difference_add)} {
00842         $widgets(txt) tag configure [expr {$show_vars(difference_sub) ? "add" : "addonly"}] -background $color
00843       }
00844     }
00845 
00846     # Colorize the selection
00847     if {[set color [lindex $labels(select_background) $label_index(color)]] ne ""} {
00848       $widgets(txt) tag configure select -background [expr {$show_vars(select_background) ? $color : ""}] \
00849         -foreground [expr {$show_vars(select_background) ? [lindex $labels(select_foreground) $label_index(color)] : ""}]
00850     }
00851 
00852     # Colorize the menubuttons and menus
00853     if {$tmtheme ne ""} {
00854       foreach {lbl info} [array get labels] {
00855         set mnu $widgets(m:$lbl)
00856         foreach scope [array names all_scopes] {
00857           catch { $mnu entryconfigure $scope -foreground $all_scopes($scope) }
00858         }
00859       }
00860     }
00861 
00862   }
00863 
00864   ######################################################################
00865   # Returns the name of the top-level window.
00866   proc get_win {} {
00867 
00868     return [expr {([file tail $::argv0] eq "themer.tcl") ? "." : ".thwin"}]
00869 
00870   }
00871 
00872   ######################################################################
00873   # Returns the path of the top-level window.
00874   proc get_path {} {
00875 
00876     return [expr {([file tail $::argv0] eq "themer.tcl") ? "" : ".thwin"}]
00877 
00878   }
00879 
00880   ######################################################################
00881   # Imports the given TextMate theme and displays the result in the UI.
00882   proc import_tm {theme {callback ""}} {
00883 
00884     variable base_labels
00885     variable labels
00886     variable widgets
00887     variable tmtheme
00888     variable all_scopes
00889 
00890     # Set the theme
00891     set tmtheme $theme
00892 
00893     # Initialize the labels array
00894     array set labels [array get base_labels]
00895     
00896     # Create the UI
00897     create $callback
00898 
00899     # Initialize the widgets
00900     wm title [get_win] [msgcat::mc "Import TextMate Theme"]
00901     $widgets(action) configure -text [msgcat::mc "Import"]
00902     catch { pack $widgets(reset) -side left -padx 2 -pady 2 }
00903 
00904     # Set the label colors to red
00905     foreach l [array names widgets l:*] {
00906       $widgets($l) configure -foreground "red"
00907       $widgets(b:[lindex [split $l :] 1]) configure -compound left
00908     }
00909 
00910     # Read the theme
00911     read_tmtheme $theme
00912 
00913     # Update the menus
00914     foreach mnu [array names widgets m:*] {
00915 
00916       set lbl [lindex [split $mnu :] 1]
00917 
00918       # Clear the menu
00919       $widgets($mnu) delete 0 end
00920 
00921       # Add the custom menu
00922       $widgets($mnu) add command -label [msgcat::mc "Create custom"] -command "themer::create_custom_color $lbl"
00923       $widgets($mnu) add separator
00924 
00925       # Add the scopes to the menu
00926       set i 2
00927       foreach scope [lsort [array names all_scopes]] {
00928         $widgets($mnu) add command -label $scope -columnbreak [expr ($i % 40) == 39] \
00929           -command "themer::handle_menu_select $lbl $scope"
00930         incr i
00931       }
00932 
00933     }
00934 
00935   }
00936 
00937   ######################################################################
00938   # Imports the given tke theme and displays the result in the UI.
00939   proc import_tke {theme {callback ""}} {
00940 
00941     variable base_labels
00942     variable labels
00943     variable widgets
00944     variable tmtheme
00945     variable all_scopes
00946 
00947     # Set the theme
00948     set tmtheme $theme
00949 
00950     # Initialize the labels array
00951     array set labels [array get base_labels]
00952     
00953     # Create the UI
00954     create $callback
00955 
00956     # Initialize UI
00957     wm title [get_win] [msgcat::mc "Edit theme"]
00958     $widgets(action) configure -text [msgcat::mc "Save"]
00959     catch { pack $widgets(reset) -side left -padx 2 -pady 2 }
00960     catch { pack $widgets(saveas) -side right -padx 2 -pady 2 }
00961 
00962     # Read the theme
00963     read_tketheme $theme
00964 
00965   }
00966 
00967   ######################################################################
00968   # Allows the user to create a new theme.
00969   proc create_new {{callback ""}} {
00970 
00971     variable base_labels
00972     variable labels
00973     variable widgets
00974     variable tmtheme
00975     variable label_index
00976 
00977     # Clear the theme
00978     set tmtheme ""
00979 
00980     # Initialize the labels array
00981     array set labels [array get base_labels]
00982     
00983     # Create the UI
00984     create $callback
00985 
00986     # Initialize the widgets
00987     wm title [get_win] [msgcat::mc "Create New Theme"]
00988     $widgets(action) configure -text [msgcat::mc "Create"]
00989     catch { pack forget $widgets(reset) }
00990 
00991     # Initialize the labels array
00992     lset labels(background)        $label_index(color) "black"
00993     lset labels(foreground)        $label_index(color) "white"
00994     lset labels(select_background) $label_index(color) "blue"
00995     lset labels(select_foreground) $label_index(color) "white"
00996     lset labels(border_highlight)  $label_index(color) "yellow"
00997     lset labels(cursor)            $label_index(color) "grey"
00998     lset labels(keywords)          $label_index(color) "red"
00999     lset labels(comments)          $label_index(color) "blue"
01000     lset labels(strings)           $label_index(color) "green"
01001     lset labels(numbers)           $label_index(color) "orange"
01002     lset labels(punctuation)       $label_index(color) "white"
01003     lset labels(precompile)        $label_index(color) "yellow"
01004     lset labels(miscellaneous1)    $label_index(color) "pink"
01005     lset labels(miscellaneous2)    $label_index(color) "gold"
01006     lset labels(miscellaneous3)    $label_index(color) "green"
01007     lset labels(line_number)       $label_index(color) [utils::auto_adjust_color "black" 40]
01008     lset labels(warning_width)     $label_index(color) [utils::auto_adjust_color "black" 40]
01009     lset labels(difference_sub)    $label_index(color) [utils::auto_mix_colors "black" r 30]
01010     lset labels(difference_add)    $label_index(color) [utils::auto_mix_colors "black" g 30]
01011 
01012   }
01013 
01014 }
01015 
01016 if {[file tail $argv0] eq "themer.tcl"} {
01017 
01018   ######################################################################
01019   # Displays usage message if this script is being executed from the
01020   # command-line.
01021   proc usage {} {
01022 
01023     puts "Usage:  themer (-h | <tmTheme file> | <tkeTheme file>)"
01024     puts ""
01025     puts "Options:"
01026     puts "  -h  Displays this help information"
01027     puts ""
01028 
01029     exit
01030 
01031   }
01032 
01033   # Parse the command-line options
01034   set i 0
01035   while {$i < $argc} {
01036     switch [lindex $argv $i] {
01037       -h      { usage }
01038       default { set theme [lindex $argv $i] }
01039     }
01040     incr i
01041   }
01042 
01043   # Set the theme to clam
01044   ttk::style theme use clam
01045 
01046   if {[info exists theme]} {
01047     set ext [string tolower [file extension $theme]]
01048     switch -exact -- $ext {
01049       .tmtheme  { themer::import_tm $theme }
01050       .tketheme { themer::import_tke $theme }
01051       default   {
01052         puts [msgcat::mc "Error:  Theme is not a supported theme"]
01053         usage
01054       }
01055     }
01056   } else {
01057     themer::create_new
01058   }
01059 
01060 }
